attributes.action: save London Road Marlborough Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is used by 2500 local residents and without they would have to walk over 1/2 mile to centre of Marlborough for kiosk ,newspapers,household commodities etc as well asthe usual pension collection,saving stamps,paying electricity,gas and tv bills.
With all the visitors to Marlborough withdrawing this London Road branch would put huge burden on the High Street branch.This branch always has a queue .

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
